CMS API Reference

Reference for the Brightcove CMS API, used to access and manage your media library. To test API requests, you can use our API Testing Tools. For permissions needed for OAuth credentials, see API Operations

  • Compare all with predecessor
  • show up to version:
  • 1.0.0

Video

The video operations allow you to create, retrieve, update, and delete video objects in Video Cloud. (You cannot ingest any assets with the CMS API — to add actual asset files, including videos, use the Dynamic Ingest API.) You can also search for videos, get a count of all your videos or of search results, get the sources, images, and digital master for a video, get the playlists the video belongs to, and remove it from all playlists. There is also a GET request to return all custom fields for the account.

Video - Get Videos

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a page of video objects

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

URL Parameters

Field Type Description
limit optional Number

number of videos to return

Default value: 20
offset optional Number

number of videos to skip in the response

Default value: 0
q optional String

search string - see search guide for details
sort optional String

field to sort results by; if absent and there is a search string, results are sorted by relevance — note that plays_total and plays_trailing_week are not included in the response - note: to sort in descending order, preface the sort field name with a minus (-) sign

Default value: -updated_at

Allowed values: "name", "reference_id", "created_at", "published_at", "updated_at", "schedule_starts_at", "schedule_ends_at", "state", "plays_total", "plays_trailing_week"

  • Search Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos?q=tags:nature,name:nature

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true
created_at DateString

when the video was created
ad_keys String

string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands. For example: "adKeys": "category=sports&live=true"
clip_source_video_id String

The ID of the source video that was clipped to produce this video or null if this video is not a clip of another video
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
delivery_type String

video delivery type - remote, static_origin, dynamic_origin or unknown
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
economics String

whether video is AD_SUPPORTED
folder_id String

id for the folder the video belongs to
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
has_digital_master Boolean

whether video has an archived master than can be used for retranscoding

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
offline_enabled Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing
original_filename String

the original file name for the uploaded video
projection String

used for 360 videos
published_at DateString

start date-time of first activation in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
  starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
  ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of sharing properties (applicable only to multiple accounts)
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String[]

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
  in_band_metadata_track_dispatch_type String

If this field is present, it means that references for this text track are available in the associated video's manifest
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
         "account_id": "1752604059001",
         "complete": true,
         "created_at": "2015-09-17T16:08:37.108Z",
         "cue_points": [],
         "custom_fields": {},
         "description": null,
         "digital_master_id": "4492154733001",
         "duration": 155573,
         "economics": "AD_SUPPORTED",
         "folder_id": null,
         "geo": null,
         "id": "4492075574001",
         "images": {
             "poster": {
                 "asset_id": "4492153571001",
                 "sources": [
                     {
                         "src": "https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/6/1752604059001/201509/3164/1752604059001_4492153571001_4492075574001-vs.jpg?pubId=1752604059001&videoId=4492075574001"
                     }
                 ],
                 "src": "https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/6/1752604059001/201509/3164/1752604059001_4492153571001_4492075574001-vs.jpg?pubId=1752604059001&videoId=4492075574001"
             },
             "thumbnail": {
                 "asset_id": "4492154714001",
                 "sources": [
                     {
                         "src": "https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/6/1752604059001/201509/3164/1752604059001_4492154714001_4492075574001-th.jpg?pubId=1752604059001&videoId=4492075574001"
                     }
                 ],
                 "src": "https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/6/1752604059001/201509/3164/1752604059001_4492154714001_4492075574001-th.jpg?pubId=1752604059001&videoId=4492075574001"
             }
         },
         "link": null,
         "long_description": null,
         "name": "sea_marvels.mp4",
         "reference_id": null,
         "schedule": null,
         "sharing": null,
         "state": "ACTIVE",
         "tags": [],
         "text_tracks": [
             {
                 "asset_id": "0cbd3425-8e94-46e6-9a10-a0d4491d4893",
                 "default": true,
                 "id": "c9001cee-d7f9-4b67-955c-9764cfc3d1f4",
                 "kind": "captions",
                 "label": null,
                 "mime_type": "text/vtt",
                 "sources": [
                     {
                         "src": "https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/3/1752604059001/201509/3164/1752604059001_0cbd3425-8e94-46e6-9a10-a0d4491d4893_intro-vcs.vtt?pubId=1752604059001&videoId=4492075574001"
                     }
                 ],
                 "src": "https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/3/1752604059001/201509/3164/1752604059001_0cbd3425-8e94-46e6-9a10-a0d4491d4893_intro-vcs.vtt?pubId=1752604059001&videoId=4492075574001",
                 "srclang": "en"
             }
         ],
         "updated_at": "2015-09-17T17:41:20.782Z"
     }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
INVALID_SORT json

400: sort parameter specified and invalid field
ILLEGAL_QUERY json

400: The search string syntax was invalid - example: 1) doing a tags search that ends with a comma or has an unclosed quote
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response
  • 400 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 INVALID_SORT
[
    {
        "error_code": "INVALID_SORT",
        "message": "attempted to sort by invalid property: 'foo'"
    }
]

Video - Get Video Count

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets count of videos for the account or a search

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/counts/videos

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

URL Parameters

Field Type Description
q optional String

search string - see search guide for details
sort optional String

field to sort results by; if absent and there is a search string, results are sorted by relevance — note that plays_total and plays_trailing_week are not included in the response

Default value: -updated_at

Allowed values: "name", "reference_id", "created_at", "published_at", "updated_at", "schedule_starts_at", "schedule_ends_at", "state", "plays_total", "plays_trailing_week"

  • Search Count Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/counts/videos?q=tags:nature,name:nature

Response Fields

Field Type Description
count Number

the count of videos found
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "count": 2678
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
INVALID_SORT json

400: sort parameter specified and invalid field
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response
  • 400 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 INVALID_SORT
[
    {
        "error_code": "INVALID_SORT",
        "message": "attempted to sort by invalid property: 'foo'"
    }
]

Video - Get Video by ID or Reference ID

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a video object

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or multiple ids separated by commas) (or ref:reference_id - only one reference id)
  • Get Video Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4492075574001
// or
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/ref:my_reference_id

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true
ad_keys String

string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands. For example: "adKeys": "category=sports&live=true"
clip_source_video_id String

The ID of the source video that was clipped to produce this video or null if this video is not a clip of another video
created_at DateString

when the video was created
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
delivery_type String

video delivery type - remote, static_origin, dynamic_origin or unknown
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
economics String

whether video is AD_SUPPORTED
folder_id String

id of the folder that contains the video
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
has_digital_master Boolean

whether video has an archived master than can be used for retranscoding

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
offline_enabled Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing
original_filename String

the original file name for the uploaded video
projection String

used for 360 videos
published_at DateString

start date-time of first activation in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
  starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
  ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of the sharing properties for the video
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String[]

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
  in_band_metadata_track_dispatch_type String

If this field is present, it means that references for this text track are available in the associated video's manifest
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
	"id": "5566317640001",
	"account_id": "57838016001",
	"ad_keys": null,
	"clip_source_video_id": null,

			]

		"poster": {
			"asset_id": "5566326010001",

				{
					"src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201709/1425/57838016001_5566326010001_5566317640001-vs.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=5566317640001",
					"height": 720,
					"width": 1280
				},
				{
					"src": "https://brightcove.hs.llnwd.net/v2/unsecured/media/57838016001/201709/1425/57838016001_5566326010001_5566317640001-vs.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=5566317640001",
					"height": 720,
					"width": 1280
				}
			]
		}
	},
	"link": null,
	"long_description": null,
	"name": "Adult-and-young-swan-Sizergh-Castlle-Cumbria",
	"original_filename": "Adult-and-young-swan-Sizergh-Castlle-Cumbria.mov",
	"projection": null,
	"published_at": "2017-09-06T12:52:08.639Z",
	"reference_id": null,
	"schedule": null,
	"sharing": {
		"by_external_acct": false,
		"by_id": null,
		"source_id": null,
		"to_external_acct": true,
		"by_reference": false
	},
	"state": "ACTIVE",
	"tags": [
	],
	"text_tracks": [
	],
	"updated_at": "2017-09-06T13:01:03.817Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Video - Get Video Sources

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets an array of sources (renditions) for a video

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/sources

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id).
  • Get Video Sources Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/3931368155001/sources

Response Field

Field Type Description
app_name String

address for RTMP stream
asset_id String

system id for the rendition
codec String

the video codec for the rendition
container String

the video container for the rendition
duration Number

duration in milliseconds
encoding_rate Number

encoding rate in bps
height Number

frame height in pixels
remote Boolean

whether the source is a remote asset
size Number

file size in bytes
src Url

URL for HTTP rendition
steam_name String

the stream name on the CDN
type String

the type for segmented streams
uploaded_at DateString

date/time when the video was uploaded
width Number

frame width in pixels
  • Dynamic Delivery Video Success Response
  • Non Dynamic Delivery Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "src": "https://manifest.prod.boltdns.net/manifest/v1/hls/v4/clear/57838016001/ae81dd9b-99ba-4899-bc8b-9402cf242210/10s/master.m3u8?fastly_token=NTk2MzQ5NDJfZTg4MWE3NGVhMGI1ZWY5MjZjNGEyMGJkZDlmNTE0MjhmMDEyNDgwOGFiM2UxZjZlNjI5ZGZjNDE0YjQ5MmZmYQ%3D%3D",

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

Video - Get Video Images

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the images for a video

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/images

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id).
  • Get Video Images Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/3931368155001/images

Response Fields

Field Type Description
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "poster": {
        "asset_id": "4564811454001",
        "remote": false,
        "sources": [
            {
                "height": 540,
                "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201510/826/57838016001_4564811454001_3931368155001-vs.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001",

            },
            {

                "width": 960
            }
        ],
        "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201510/826/57838016001_4564811454001_3931368155001-vs.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001"
    },
    "thumbnail": {
        "asset_id": "4564811464001",
        "remote": false,
        "sources": [

                "height": 90,

                "width": 160
            },
            {
                "height": 90,
                "src": "https://brightcove.hs.llnwd.net/v2/unsecured/media/57838016001/201510/826/57838016001_4564811464001_3931368155001-th.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001",
                "width": 160
            }
        ],
        "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201510/826/57838016001_4564811464001_3931368155001-th.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001"

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }

        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }

Video - Get Digital Master Info

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the stored digital master for a video, if any

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/digital_master

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id).
  • Get Video Digital MasterExample: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/3931368155001/digital_master

Response Field

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
audio_only Boolean

whether this assest has an audio track only
cdn_origin_id String

id on the origin CDN if any
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true
controller_type String

video controller type
current_filename String

the file name
drm Object

DRM licensing information
encoding_rate Number

encoding rate in bps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
hds Object

HDS information
hls Object

HLS information
id String

the video id
name String

the video title
preview_thumbnail_asset_id String

thumbnail asset id
progressive_download Boolean

whether available via progressive download
reference_id String

reference id
remote_stream_name String

for remote stream types
remote_url String

for HTTP types
sharded_directory String
size Number

in bytes
type String

asset type
update_at DateString

date/time last modified
uploaded_at DateString

date/time added
version Number
video_codec String

the video codec
video_container String

the video container
video_duration Number

in milliseconds
  • Success Response video digital master (Dynamic Delivery):
  • Success Response video digital master:
  • Success Response no digital master 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "id": "0e1ba58d-cc8d-438a-9db5-3bb3d79487c8",

Video - Delete Digital Master

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes the archived digital master for a video. Be sure to read Digital Master Delete API before using this operation to understand the implications.

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/digital_master

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Delete Digital Master Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/digital_master
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Video - Get Playlists for Video

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets an array of Manual (EXPLICIT) playlists that contain a video object for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/references

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id).
  • Get Video References Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4492075574001/references

Response Field

Field Type Description
playlists String[]

array of EXPLICIT playlist ids that contain the video
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "playlists": [
        "4452341376001",
        "7894341376001"
    ]
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

    }

Video - Create Video

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Create a new video object in the account. Note: this does not ingest a video file - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
name String

video title

Size range: 1..255
description optional String

video short description

Size range: 0..250
economics optional String

whether the video supports ads (used by the Smart Player, but not by the Brightcove Player)

Default value: AD_SUPPORTED

Allowed values: "AD_SUPPORTED", "FREE"

drm_disabled optional Boolean

if DRM is enabled for the account, setting this field to true will prevent this video from being DRM-protected (this field is only available for accounts enabled for Dynamic Delivery and DRM)
long_description optional String

video long description

Size range: 0..5000
reference_id optional String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)

Size range: ..150
state optional String

state determines whether the video is playable or not

Default value: ACTIVE

Allowed values: "ACTIVE", "INACTIVE"

tags optional String[]

array of tags - note that tags may not contain commas

Default value: []
custom_fields optional Object

map of fieldname-value pairs; values have a maximum length of 1024 single-byte characters

Default value: {}
cue_points optional Object[]

array of cue point maps

Default value: []
  name optional String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Allowed values: "AD", "CODE"

  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata optional String

optional metadata string (512 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null

Size range: ..512
  force-stop optional Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
geo optional Object

map of geo-filtering properties

Default value: {}
  countries optional String[]

array of ISO 3166 list of 2- or 4-letter codes in lower-case (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries optional Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted optional Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
schedule optional Object

map of scheduling properties

Default value: {}
  starts_at optional DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601 format

Default value: null
  ends_at optional DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601 format

Default value: null
  • Create Video Example: 
{
    "name": "Moose Herd",
    "description": "Herd of moose grazing",
    "reference_id": "moose_2015_09_17",
    "tags": [
        "nature",
        "animals"
    ],
    "custom_fields": {
        "topic": "wildlife",
        "subtopic": "mammals"
    }
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true
ad_keys String

string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands. For example: "adKeys": "category=sports&live=true"
clip_source_video_id String

The ID of the source video that was clipped to produce this video or null if this video is not a clip of another video
created_at DateString

when the video was created
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
delivery_type String

video delivery type - remote, static_origin, dynamic_origin or unknown
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
economics String

whether video is AD_SUPPORTED
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
has_digital_master Boolean

whether video has an archived master than can be used for retranscoding

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
offline_enabled Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing
original_filename String

the original file name for the uploaded video
projection String

used for 360 videos
published_at DateString

start date-time of first activation in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
  starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
  ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of the sharing properties for the video
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String[]

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
  in_band_metadata_track_dispatch_type String

If this field is present, it means that references for this text track are available in the associated video's manifest
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "complete": false,
    "created_at": "2015-09-18T15:59:23.756Z",
    "cue_points": [],
    "custom_fields": {},
    "description": "Herd of moose grazing",
    "digital_master_id": null,
    "duration": null,
    "economics": "AD_SUPPORTED",
    "folder_id": null,
    "geo": null,
    "id": "4494811891001",
    "images": {},
    "link": null,
    "long_description": null,
    "name": "Moose Herd",
    "reference_id": "moose_2015_09_17",
    "schedule": null,
    "sharing": null,
    "state": "ACTIVE",
    "tags": [
        "animals",
        "nature"
    ],
    "text_tracks": [],
    "updated_at": "2015-09-18T15:59:23.764Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
BAD_VALUE json

403: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: You attempted to create a video with a reference id that is already in use, or add a reference id to a video which is already used by another video
ILLEGAL_FIELD json

422: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Video - Update Video

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Update a video's metadata note that this API does not ingest any media files - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion. Also note that replacing WebVTT text tracks is a two-step operation - see Add WebVTT Captions for details.

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
name optional String

video title

Size range: 1..255
description optional String

video short description

Size range: ..250
economics optional String

video short description

Default value: AD_SUPPORTED

Allowed values: "AD_supported", "FREE"

drm_disabled optional Boolean

if DRM is enabled for the account, setting this field to true will prevent this video from being DRM-protected (this field is only available for accounts enabled for Dynamic Delivery and DRM)
long_description optional String

video long description

Size range: ..5000
offline_enabled optional Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing (DRM-packaged videos only)

Default value: false
projection optional String

Used for 360 video

Default value: null

Allowed values: "equirectangular"

reference_id optional String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)

Size range: ..150
state optional String

state determines whether the video is playable or not

Default value: ACTIVE

Allowed values: "ACTIVE", "INACTIVE"

tags optional String[]

array of tags - note that tags may not contain commas

Default value: []
custom_fields optional Object

map of fieldname-value pairs; values have a maximum length of 1024 single-byte characters

Default value: {}
cue_points optional Object[]

array of cue point maps

Default value: []
  name optional String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Allowed values: "AD", "CODE"

  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata optional String

optional metadata string (512 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null

Size range: ..512
  force-stop optional Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
geo optional Object

map of geo-filtering properties

Default value: {}
  countries optional String[]

array of ISO 3166 list of 2- or 4-letter codes in lower-case (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries optional Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted optional Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
link optional Object

map of scheduling properties

Default value: {}
  text optional String

text for the link

Size range: ..255
  url optional Url

URL for the link

Size range: ..250
published_at DateString

ISO-8601 date-time string indicating when the video was published
schedule optional Object

map of scheduling properties

Default value: {}
  starts_at optional DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601 format

Default value: null
  ends_at optional DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601 format

Default value: null
text_tracks optional Object[]

array of text track maps — NOTE text_tracks are not settable for ingested text_tracks, but are settable otherwise, and can be used to add text tracks to ingested or remote asset videos

Default value: []
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind optional String

kind of text track

Allowed values: "captions", "chapters", "subtitles", "metadata"

  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type optional String

mime-type for the track
  label optional String

label for the track
  default optional Boolean

whether this is the default track

Default value: false
  • Update Video Example: 
{
    "name": "Moose Herd",
    "description": "Herd of moose grazing",
    "reference_id": "moose_2015_09_17",
    "tags": [
        "nature",
        "animals"
    ],
    "custom_fields": {
        "topic": "wildlife",
        "subtopic": "mammals"
    }
}

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
ad_keys optional String

string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands.

Default value: null

Size range: ..1800

Response Fields

Field Type Description
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true
ad_keys String

string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands. For example: "adKeys": "category=sports&live=true"
clip_source_video_id String

The ID of the source video that was clipped to produce this video or null if this video is not a clip of another video
created_at DateString

when the video was created
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
delivery_type String

video delivery type - remote, static_origin, dynamic_origin or unknown
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
economics String

whether video is AD_SUPPORTED
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
has_digital_master Boolean

whether video has an archived master than can be used for retranscoding

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
offline_enabled Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing
original_filename String

the original file name for the uploaded video
projection String

used for 360 videos
published_at DateString

start date-time of first activation in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
  starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
  ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of the sharing properties for the video
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String[]

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
  in_band_metadata_track_dispatch_type String

If this field is present, it means that references for this text track are available in the associated video's manifest
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "complete": false,
    "created_at": "2015-09-18T15:59:23.756Z",
    "cue_points": [],
    "custom_fields": {},
    "description": "Herd of moose grazing",
    "digital_master_id": null,
    "duration": null,
    "economics": "AD_SUPPORTED",
    "folder_id": null,
    "geo": null,
    "id": "4494811891001",
    "images": {},
    "link": null,
    "long_description": null,
    "name": "Moose Herd",
    "reference_id": "moose_2015_09_17",
    "schedule": null,
    "sharing": null,
    "state": "ACTIVE",
    "tags": [
        "animals",
        "nature"
    ],
    "text_tracks": [],
    "updated_at": "2015-09-18T15:59:23.764Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
AD_CONFIG_INACTIVE json

400: Ad configuration specified in an SSAI request is inactive
AD_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND json

400: Ad configuration specified in an SSAI request was not found
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
BAD_VALUE json

403: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: You attempted to create a video with a reference id that is already in use, or add a reference id to a video which is already used by another video
ILLEGAL_FIELD json

422: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: the JSON data was not valid - error messages vary depending on the problem
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: an unknown internal error occurred - this might be a temporary system issue, but if the problem persists, it is likely an uncaught error in the request - contact Support
TIMEOUT json

503: Server likely too busy - try again later
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Video - Remove Video from all Playlists

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Removes the video from all EXPLICIT playlists for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/references

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id).
  • Get Video References Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4492075574001/references
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Video - Delete Video

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes a video

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id)
  • Get Video References Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4492075574001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content **returned if video is deleted or not found**

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
REFERENCES_EXIST json

409: The video is in one or more manual playlists
PRE_CONDITION_FAILED json

412: usually this means the caller provided an ETag that didn't match the version of the video

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
INTERNAL_ERROR json

500: Error in the backend
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Video - Get Status of Ingest Jobs

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Get the status of all ingest jobs associated with a video (including the orginal ingestion, replacing and retranscoding the video). NOTE: this operation only works for videos that were ingested using Dynamic Delivery profiles.

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/ingest_jobs

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id)
  • Get Status of Ingest Jobs Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/5128433746001/ingest_jobs

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id string

the ingest job id
state string

the current state of the ingest job
account_id string

the Video Cloud account id
video_id string

the video id
error_code string

the error code if the job failed
error_message string

the error message if the job failed
updated_at string

when the status was last updated
started_at string

when processing started
priority string

priority of the job (normal or low)
submitted_at string

when the job was submitted
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200
[
	{
		"id": "ac49b1db-e6e1-477f-a2c1-70b9cd3107cb",
		"state": "finished",
		"account_id": "57838016001",
		"video_id": "5636411346001",
		"error_code": null,
		"error_message": null,
		"updated_at": "2017-11-07T13:56:51.505Z",
		"started_at": "2017-11-07T13:56:12.510Z",
		"priority": "normal",
		"submitted_at": "2017-11-07T13:56:12.435Z"
	},
	{
		"id": "10605652-8b6f-4f22-b190-01bd1938677b",
		"state": "processing",
		"account_id": "57838016001",
		"video_id": "5636411346001",
		"error_code": null,
		"error_message": null,
		"updated_at": null,
		"started_at": null,
		"priority": "low",
		"submitted_at": "2017-11-07T14:06:35.000Z"
	}
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
INTERNAL_ERROR json

500: Error in the backend
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Video - Get Status of Ingest Job

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Get the status of an ingest job associated with a video (including the orginal ingestion, replacing and retranscoding the video)

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/ingest_jobs/:job_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID (or ref:reference_id)
job_id String

the job ID for the ingest job
  • Get Status of Ingest Jobs Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/5128433746001/ingest_jobs/ac49b1db-e6e1-477f-a2c1-70b9cd3107cb

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id string

the ingest job id
state string

the current state of the ingest job
account_id string

the Video Cloud account id
video_id string

the video id
error_code string

the error code if the job failed
error_message string

the error message if the job failed
updated_at string

when the status was last updated
started_at string

when processing started
priority string

priority of the job (normal or low)
submitted_at string

when the job was submitted
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200
{
	"id": "ac49b1db-e6e1-477f-a2c1-70b9cd3107cb",
	"state": "finished",
	"account_id": "57838016001",
	"video_id": "5636411346001",
	"error_code": null,
	"error_message": null,
	"updated_at": "2017-11-07T13:56:51.505Z",
	"started_at": "2017-11-07T13:56:12.510Z",
	"priority": "normal",
	"submitted_at": "2017-11-07T13:56:12.435Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
INTERNAL_ERROR json

500: Error in the backend
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Video - Get Custom Fields

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a list of custom fields for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/video_fields

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
  • Get Custom Fields Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/video_fields

Response Fields

Field Type Description
custom_fields Object[]

array of custom field maps
  description String

description (instruction for user)
  display_name String

display name
  enum_values String[]

array of string values for select type fields
  id String

data name for the field (used to access it in searches, etc.)
  required Boolean

whether field must have a value before video can be active
  type String

custom field type (enum or string)
max_custom_fields String

maximum number of custom fields for the account
standard_fields Object[]

array of standard field maps
  description String

description (instruction for user)
  id String

data name for the field (used to access it in searches, etc.)
  required Boolean

whether field must have a value before video can be active
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
"custom_fields": [
    {
        "description": "Add a topic",
        "display_name": "Subject",
        "enum_values": [
            "Reptiles",
            "Mammals",
            "Other",
            "wildlife",
            "Fish",
            "Birds",
            "Insects"
        ],
        "id": "subject",
        "required": false,
        "type": "enum"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Uploader UserID",
        "id": "uploader-userid",
        "required": false,
        "type": "string"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Rating",
        "id": "rating",
        "required": false,
        "type": "string"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Duration",
        "id": "duration",
        "required": false,
        "type": "string"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Associatedtopics",
        "id": "associated-topics",
        "required": false,
        "type": "string"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Custom Theme Path",
        "enum_values": [
            "http://files.brightcove.com/BCL_customLabelTheme2.css",
            "http://files.brightcove.com/BCL_customLabelTheme.css"
        ],
        "id": "customthemepath",
        "required": false,
        "type": "enum"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Text Color",
        "enum_values": [
            "#4C4D4F",
            "#CF0050",
            "#F4901E",
            "#619FA8"
        ],
        "id": "textcolor",
        "required": false,
        "type": "enum"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Captions File URL",
        "id": "dfxppath",
        "required": false,
        "type": "string"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Purpose",
        "enum_values": [
            "Training",
            "Demo",
            "Sample",
            "Solution"
        ],
        "id": "purpose",
        "required": false,
        "type": "enum"
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "display_name": "Downloadable",
        "enum_values": [
            "yes",
            "no"
        ],
        "id": "downloadable",
        "required": false,
        "type": "enum"
    }
],
"max_custom_fields": 10,
"standard_fields": [
    {
        "description": null,
        "id": "description",
        "required": false
    },
    {
        "description": null,
        "id": "tags",
        "required": false
    }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
REFERENCES_EXIST json

400: You are attempting to delete a video that is included in at least one playlist
SHARED_VIDEO json

400: Deletion of shared videos is not yet supported
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Playlist

Playlist operations allow you to create, retrieve, update, and delete playlists. You can also get a count of playlists and search for playlists by tags. There are also operations for getting the videos or the count of videos in the playlist, and for adding videos to and removing them from a playlist.

Playlist - Get Playlists

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a page of playlist objects for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/playlists

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

URL Parameters

Field Type Description
limit optional Number

number of videos to return

Default value: 20
offset optional Number

number of videos to skip in the response

Default value: 0
q optional String

search string - see search guide for details. Only _search by type is currently supported for playlists — e.g. q=type:EXPLICIT.
sort optional String

field to sort results by; if absent and there is a search string, results are sorted by relevance or if there is no search string, results are sorted by updated_at descending - note: to sort in descending order, preface the field name with a minus (-) sign

Default value: updated_at

Allowed values: "name", "updated_at"

  • Search for Playlists Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/playlists?q=type:EXPLICIT

Response Field

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time created
description String

playlist description
favorite Boolean

whether playlist is in favorites list
id String

the playlist id
name String

the playlist name
reference_id String

the playlist reference id
type String

the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
updated_at DateString

date/time last modified
video_ids String[]

array of video ids (EXPLICIT playlists only)
search String

search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "account_id": "1752604059001",
        "created_at": "2015-08-31T15:57:34.885Z",
        "description": null,
        "favorite": true,
        "id": "4452341376001",
        "name": "OutLearn Demo Playlist",
        "reference_id": null,
        "type": "EXPLICIT",
        "updated_at": "2015-08-31T15:57:52.437Z",
        "video_ids": [
            "4454723119001",
            "4454629913001",
            "4454629914001",
            "4454620115001",
            "4454620114001",
            "4454620113001",
            "4454620112001"
        ]
    },
    {
        "account_id": "1752604059001",
        "created_at": "2012-12-10T19:58:26.710Z",
        "description": null,
        "favorite": false,
        "id": "2025881886001",
        "limit": 30,
        "name": "node7707 Playlist",
        "reference_id": null,
        "search": "+tags:\"node7704\"",
        "type": "ACTIVATED_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST",
        "updated_at": "2012-12-10T19:58:26.738Z"
    }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed - check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
INVALID_SORT json

400: sort parameter specified and invalid field
INVALID_SEARCH json

400: search string invalid (may not have been URI-encoded)
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Field Type Description

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Path Parameters

Field Type Description

URL Parameters

Field Type Description
q optional String

search string - seesearch guide for details
  • Search Example:

Field Type Description
count Number

count of playlists found

    "count": 267
}

Playlist - Get Playlist by ID

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a playlist object for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/playlists/:playlist_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
playlist_id Number

Video Cloud playlist ID, or multiple playlist ids separated by commas.
  • Search for Playlists Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/playlists/749117323001

Response Field

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time created
description String

playlist description
favorite Boolean

whether playlist is in favorites list
id String

the playlist id
name String

the playlist name
reference_id String

the playlist reference id
type String

the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
updated_at DateString

date/time last modified
video_ids String[]

array of video ids (EXPLICIT playlists only)
search String

search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "account_id": "1752604059001",
        "created_at": "2015-08-31T15:57:34.885Z",

        "name": "OutLearn Demo Playlist",
        "reference_id": null,

Playlist - Get Videos in Playlist

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the video objects for videos in a playlist for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/playlists/:playlist_id/videos

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
playlist_id Number

Video Cloud playlist ID.
  • Search for Playlists Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/playlists/1403224824001/videos

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete
created_at DateString

when the video was created
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
delivery_type String

video delivery type - remote, static_origin, dynamic_origin or unknown
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
Economics String

whether video is AD_ENABLED (used by the Smart Player, not by the Brightcove Player)
folder_id String

id for the folder the video belongs to
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
offline_enabled Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing
original_filename String

the original file name for the uploaded video
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of sharing properties (applicable only to multiple accounts)
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "account_id": "57838016001",
        "complete": true,
        "created_at": "2012-01-20T13:30:47.350Z",
        "cue_points": [],
        "custom_fields": {
            "dfxppath": "http://files.brightcove.com/BCL_599562691001.xml",
            "purpose": "Training"
        },
        "description": "BC440 Resizing Players",

        "geo": null,

                    {
                        "height": null,
                        "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/e1/pd/57838016001/57838016001_1403719702001_vs-1403716501001.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=1403635561001",
                        "width": null
                    },
                    {
                        "height": null,

                    }

                "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/e1/pd/57838016001/57838016001_1403719702001_vs-1403716501001.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=1403635561001"

        "images": {
            "poster": {
                "asset_id": "1403718080001",
                "remote": false,
                "sources": [
                    {
                        "height": null,
                        "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/e1/pd/57838016001/57838016001_1403718080001_vs-1403705347001.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=1403682587001",
                        "width": null
                    },
                    {
                        "height": null,

                    }
