Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed - check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
INVALID_SORT json

400: sort parameter specified and invalid field
INVALID_SEARCH json

400: search string invalid (may not have been URI-encoded)
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Playlist - Create Playlist

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Creates a new playlist

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/playlists

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
name String

playlist name

Size range: 1..255
description optional String

playlist description

Size range: 1..255
reference_id optional String

playlist reference id
type String

of playlist

Allowed values: "EXPLICIT", "ACTIVATED_OLDEST_TO_NEWEST", "ACTIVATED_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST", "ALPHABETICAL", "PLAYS_TOTAL", "PLAYS_TRAILING_WEEK", "START_DATE_OLDEST_TO_NEWEST", "START_DATE_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST"

limit optional Number

maximum number of videos to include (smart playlists only)
video_ids optional String[]

array of video ids (EXPLICIT playlists only)
search optional String

search string to get the videos (smart playlists only)
  • Create Explicit Playlist Example:
  • Create Smart Playlist Example: 
{
    "description": "My new bird playlist",
    "name": "Bird Videos",
    "type": "EXPLICIT",
    "video_ids": [
        "4084164751001",
        "734484322001",
        "734462570001"
    ]
}
{
    "description": "My new sea playlist",
    "name": "Sea Videos",
    "type": "ACTIVATED_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST",
    "limit": 20
    "search": "tags:\"sealife\",\"water\""
}

Response Field

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time created
description String

playlist description
favorite Boolean

whether playlist is in favorites list
id String

the playlist id
name String

the playlist name
reference_id String

the playlist reference id
type String

the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
updated_at DateString

date/time last modified
video_ids String[]

array of video ids (EXPLICIT playlists only)
search String

search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "created_at": "2015-09-20T18:50:27.865Z",
    "description": "My new bird playlist",
    "favorite": false,
    "id": "4492151631001",
    "name": "Bird Videos",
    "reference_id": null,
    "type": "EXPLICIT",
    "updated_at": "2015-09-20T18:50:27.865Z",
    "video_ids": [
        "4084164751001",
        "734484322001",
        "734462570001"
    ]
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
BAD_VALUE json

400: The JSON could not be parsed
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use
ILLEGAL_FIELD json

422: Spelling error or use of non-existent field
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Playlist - Update Playlist

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates a playlist for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/playlists/:playlist_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
name String

playlist name

Size range: 1..255
description optional String

playlist description

Size range: 1..255
reference_id optional String

playlist reference id
type optional String

of playlist

Allowed values: "EXPLICIT", "ACTIVATED_OLDEST_TO_NEWEST", "ACTIVATED_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST", "ALPHABETICAL", "PLAYS_TOTAL", "PLAYS_TRAILING_WEEK", "START_DATE_OLDEST_TO_NEWEST", "START_DATE_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST"

video_ids optional String[]

array of video ids for EXPLICIT type only — note that you must replace the whole array
search optional String

the search string to generate the list of videos — only for smart playlist types
  • Update Playlist Example: 
{
    "description": "My revised bird playlist",
    "name": "Bird Videos",
    "type": "EXPLICIT",
    "video_ids": [
        "4084164751001",
        "734484322001",
        "734462570001"
    ]
}

Response Field

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time created
description String

playlist description
favorite Boolean

whether playlist is in favorites list
id String

the playlist id
name String

the playlist name
reference_id String

the playlist reference id
type String

the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
updated_at DateString

date/time last modified
video_ids String[]

array of video ids (EXPLICIT playlists only)
search String

search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "created_at": "2015-09-20T18:50:27.865Z",
    "description": "My revised bird playlist",
    "favorite": false,
    "id": "4492151631001",
    "name": "Bird Videos",
    "reference_id": null,
    "type": "EXPLICIT",
    "updated_at": "2015-09-20T18:50:27.865Z",
    "video_ids": [
        "4084164751001",
        "734484322001",
        "734462570001"
    ]
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
BAD_VALUE json

400: The JSON could not be parsed
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use
ILLEGAL_FIELD json

422: Spelling error or use of non-existent field
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Playlist - Delete Playlist

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes a playlist

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/playlists/:playlist_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
playlist_id Number

Video Cloud playlist ID.
  • Search for Playlists Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/playlists/749117323001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed - check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
INVALID_SORT json

400: sort parameter specified and invalid field
INVALID_SEARCH json

400: search string invalid (may not have been URI-encoded)
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Media Sharing

The media sharing operations allow you to create sharing relationships between a Master account and affiliates, and to share or un-share videos For more information, see Media Sharing with the CMS API

Media Sharing - List Channels

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a list of channels (currently there is only one default channel) - this is a Master account operation

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/channels

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
  • List Channels Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/channels

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

master account id
name String

channel name
enforce_custom_fields Boolean

if true, will allow sharing only if the affiliate account has all custom fields that have values for the video to be shared
enforce_geo Boolean

if true, and master account is enabled for geo-filtering, will allow sharing only if the affiliate account is also enabled for geo-filtering Note: this field is currently ignored, but this restriction will be enabled later
account_name String

master account name
created_at DateTime

when the channel was created
updated_at DateTime

when the channel was last updated
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
	{
		"account_id": "57838016001",
		"name": "default",
		"enforce_custom_fields": false,
		"enforce_geo": false,
		"account_name": "BrightcoveLearning",
		"created_at": "2017-08-23T19:12:24.139Z",
		"updated_at": "2017-08-23T19:12:24.139Z"
  }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Media Sharing - Get Channel Details

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets settings for a sharing channel (currently there is only one default channel) - this is a Master account operation

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/channels/:channel_name

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
channel_name String

The channel name.
  • Get Channel Details Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/channels/default

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

master account id
name String

channel name
enforce_custom_fields Boolean

if true, will allow sharing only if the affiliate account has all custom fields that have values for the video to be shared
enforce_geo Boolean

if true, and master account is enabled for geo-filtering, will allow sharing only if the affiliate account is also enabled for geo-filtering Note: this field is currently ignored, but this restriction will be enabled later
account_name String

master account name
created_at DateTime

when the channel was created
updated_at DateTime

when the channel was last updated
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
	{
		"account_id": "57838016001",
		"name": "default",
		"enforce_custom_fields": false,
		"enforce_geo": false,
		"account_name": "BrightcoveLearning",
		"created_at": "2017-08-23T19:12:24.139Z",
		"updated_at": "2017-08-23T19:12:24.139Z"
  }

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Media Sharing - Update Channel

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates settings for a sharing channel (currently there is only one default channel) - this is a Master account operation

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/channels/:channel_name

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
channel_name String

The channel name.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
enforce_custom_fields Boolean

Allow sharing only if affiliate account has all custom fields for which a value is set in the master account

Default value: false
enforce_geo Boolean

Allow sharing only if affiliate account is enabled for geo-filtering (if the master account is enabled for geo-filtering)

Default value: true
  • Update Channel Example: 
{
	"enforce_custom_fields" : true,
	"enforce_geo" : true
} *

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

master account id
name String

channel name
enforce_custom_fields Boolean

if true, will allow sharing only if the affiliate account has all custom fields that have values for the video to be shared
enforce_geo Boolean

if true, and master account is enabled for geo-filtering, will allow sharing only if the affiliate account is also enabled for geo-filtering Note: this field is currently ignored, but this restriction will be enabled later
account_name String

master account name
created_at DateTime

when the channel was created
updated_at DateTime

when the channel was last updated
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
	"account_id": "57838016001",
	"name": "default",
	"enforce_custom_fields": false,
	"enforce_geo": false,
	"account_name": "BrightcoveLearning",
	"created_at": "2017-08-23T19:12:24.139Z",
	"updated_at": "2017-08-23T19:12:24.139Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Header

Field Type Description

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Path Parameters

Field Type Description

channel_name String

		"account_name": "Developer Training"

Field Type Description

Field Type Description

Field Type Description

whether the contract is approved

whether shared videos will be automatically accepted
approved_at DateTime

when the contract was approved
created_at DateTime

when the contract was created
updated_at DateTime

when the contract was last updated
channel Object

the channel this contract belongs to
  account_id String

the id of the Master account
  name String

the name of the channel

	    	},
	    	"approved": false,
	    	"auto_accept": false,
	    	"approved_at": null,

Media Sharing - Approve Contract

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a list of available sharing contracts - this is an Affiliate account operation

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/contracts/master_account_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
master_account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
approved Boolean

Setting approved to true approves the contract.
auto_accept optional Boolean

Setting If true, shared videos will be automatically accepted; otherwise, they must be approved one by one.

Default value: false
  • Approve Contract Example:
  • Approve Contract Request Body Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/1752604059001/contracts/57838016001
{
  "approved": true,
  "auto_accept": true
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

affiliate account id
approved Boolean

whether the contract is approved
auto_accept Boolean

whether shared videos will be automatically accepted
approved_at DateTime

when the contract was approved
created_at DateTime

when the contract was created
updated_at DateTime

when the contract was last updated
channel Object

the channel this contract belongs to
  account_id String

the id of the Master account
  name String

the name of the channel
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
	"account_id": "1485884786001",
	"channel": {
		"account_id": "57838016001",
		"name": "default"
	},
    "approved": true,
	   "auto_accept": true,
	   "approved_at": "2017-08-27T12:27:21.582Z",
	   "created_at": "2017-08-23T17:45:41.556Z",
	   "updated_at": "2017-08-27T12:27:21.582Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }

Media Sharing - List Shares

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Lists the existing shares for an account - this is a Master account operation - do this before sharing to insure that you are not re-sharing to an affiliate, which would overwrite any affiliate metadata changes

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/shares

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID.
  • List Shares Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/5553744346001/shares

Response Fields

Field Type Description
video_id String

the video id
affiliate_id String

the id of the affiliate account the video is shared to
affiliate_video_id String

the id of the shared video in the affiliate account
statue String

the status of the sharing - either PROCESSING, COMPLETE, or FAILED
shared_at DateTime

when the video was shared
updated_at DateTime

the video was last updated in the affiliate account
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
	{
		"video_id": "5553744346001",
		"affiliate_id": "1752604059001",
		"affiliate_video_id": "5553754248001",
		"status": "COMPLETE",
		"shared_at": "2017-08-27T14:35:01.890Z",
		"updated_at": "2017-08-27T14:35:25.630Z"
	},
	{
		"video_id": "5553744346001",
		"affiliate_id": "1485884786001",
		"affiliate_video_id": "5553758415001",
		"status": "COMPLETE",
		"shared_at": "2017-08-27T14:34:34.919Z",
		"updated_at": "2017-08-27T14:35:25.212Z"
	}
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description

Media Sharing - Share Video

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Shares a video to one or more affiliates - this is an Master account operation - if the video has already been shared to an affiliate, this operation will re-share it and overwrite any affiliate metadata changes

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/shares

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
id String

affiliate account id to share to
  • Share Video Example:
  • Share Video Request Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/5553744346001/shares
[
   {"id": 1752604059001},
   {"id": 1485884786001}
]

Response Fields

Field Type Description
video_id String

the video id
affiliate_id String

the id of the affiliate account the video is shared to
affiliate_video_id String

the id of the shared video in the affiliate account
statue String

the status of the sharing - either PROCESSING, COMPLETE, or FAILED
shared_at DateTime

when the video was shared
updated_at DateTime

the video was last updated in the affiliate account
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
	{
		"video_id": "5538139814001",
		"affiliate_id": "1485884786001",
		"affiliate_video_id": "5557763316001",
		"status": "PROCESSING",
		"shared_at": "2017-08-31T18:50:13.369Z",
		"updated_at": "2017-08-31T18:50:13.369Z"
	},
	{
		"video_id": "5538139814001",
		"affiliate_id": "1752604059001",
		"affiliate_video_id": "5557767716001",
		"status": "COMPLETE",
		"shared_at": "2017-08-30T14:49:16.652Z",
		"updated_at": "2017-08-30T14:49:47.469Z"
	}
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }

Media Sharing - Accept Share

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Accept a shared video (only relevant if auto_accept is set to false). This is an Affiliate account operation.

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID.

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
state String

determines whether the video is accepted (ACTIVE) or rejected (INACTIVE)

Allowed values: "ACTIVE", "INACTIVE"

  • Update Video Example: 
{
    "state": "ACTIVE"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete — Note: when you create a new video, the complete property is automatically set to false. As soon as one rendition exists for the video, the complete property will be automatically set to true
ad_keys String

string representing the ad key/value pairs assigned to the video. Key/value pairs are formatted as key=value and are separated by ampersands. For example: "adKeys": "category=sports&live=true"
clip_source_video_id String

The ID of the source video that was clipped to produce this video or null if this video is not a clip of another video
created_at DateString

when the video was created
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
economics String

whether video is AD_SUPPORTED
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
has_digital_master Boolean

whether video has an archived master than can be used for retranscoding

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
offline_enabled Boolean

whether video is enabled for offline viewing
original_filename String

the original file name for the uploaded video
projection String

used for 360 videos
published_at DateString

start date-time of first activation in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
  starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
  ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of the sharing properties for the video
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String[]

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
  in_band_metadata_track_dispatch_type String

If this field is present, it means that references for this text track are available in the associated video's manifest
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "complete": false,
    "created_at": "2015-09-18T15:59:23.756Z",
    "cue_points": [],
    "custom_fields": {},
    "description": "Herd of moose grazing",
    "digital_master_id": null,
    "duration": null,
    "economics": "AD_SUPPORTED",
    "folder_id": null,
    "geo": null,
    "id": "4494811891001",
    "images": {},
    "link": null,
    "long_description": null,
    "name": "Moose Herd",
    "reference_id": "moose_2015_09_17",
    "schedule": null,
    "sharing": null,
    "state": "ACTIVE",
    "tags": [
        "animals",
        "nature"
    ],
    "text_tracks": [],
    "updated_at": "2015-09-18T15:59:23.764Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
AD_CONFIG_INACTIVE json

400: Ad configuration specified in an SSAI request is inactive
AD_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND json

400: Ad configuration specified in an SSAI request was not found
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
BAD_VALUE json

403: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: You attempted to create a video with a reference id that is already in use, or add a reference id to a video which is already used by another video
ILLEGAL_FIELD json

422: Spelling error or other use of non-existent field
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: the JSON data was not valid - error messages vary depending on the problem
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: an unknown internal error occurred - this might be a temporary system issue, but if the problem persists, it is likely an uncaught error in the request - contact Support
TIMEOUT json

503: Server likely too busy - try again later
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Media Sharing - Unshare Video

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Unshares a video with a specific affiliate - this is an Master account operation - do this before sharing to insure that you are not re-sharing to an affiliate, which would overwrite any affiliate metadata changes

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/shares/:affiliate_account_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID.
affiliate_account_id String

affiliate account id to remove the shared video from.
  • Share Video Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/5553744346001/shares/1485884786001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
202 ACCEPTED (indicates that the request is accepted but may not be executed immediately)

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: Resource not found
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is unavailable - this may be a temporary condition while some kind of processing of the video is in progress, but if the message persists, contact Support
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets

Asset operations allow you to manage assets including renditions, manifests, images, and text tracks. To ingest assets, you must use the Dynamic Ingest API — the POST and PATCH operations shown here can be used to add and update remote assets. GET operations will work for both ingested and remote assets.

Assets - Get Assets

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets assets for a given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Rendition list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

the Video Cloud account id
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

whether this rendition contains only an audio track, no video track (a rendition for low bandwidth devices)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
drm Object

DRM packaging details (not applicable to remote assets)
encoding_rate Number

average encoding rate in kbps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
key_systems String[]

array of strings that denote the kind of encryption used for DRM packaged renditions
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_codec String

not applicable to remote assets
video_container String

not applicable to remote assets
video_duration Number

duration in milliseconds
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
	{
		"id": "5510490788001",
		"account_id": "1752604059001",
		"audio_only": false,
		"cdn_origin_id": "5602",
		"complete": true,
		"controller_type": "DEFAULT",
		"current_filename": "1752604059001_5510490788001_5510487311001-th.jpg",
		"key_systems": [
		],

		"frame_width": 160
	},
	{
		"id": "5510492050001",

	{

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Field Type Description

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.

        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]

[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }

Assets - Get Rendition List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a list of renditions for a given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/renditions

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Rendition list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/renditions

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

the Video Cloud account id
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

whether this rendition contains only an audio track, no video track (a rendition for low bandwidth devices)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
drm Object

DRM packaging details (not applicable to remote assets)
encoding_rate Number

average encoding rate in kbps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
key_systems String[]

array of strings that denote the kind of encryption used for DRM packaged renditions
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)

the type of the asset

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

Assets - Get Rendition

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a specified rendition for a video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/renditions/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

the asset id
  • Get Rendition Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/rendition/77874616001

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

the Video Cloud account id
id String

the asset id
whether Boolean

this rendition contains only an audio track, no video track (a rendition for low bandwidth devices)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
drm Object

DRM packaging details (not applicable to remote assets)
encoding_rate Number

average encoding rate in kbps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
key_systems String[]

array of strings that denote the kind of encryption used for DRM packaged renditions
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_codec String

not applicable to remote assets
video_container String

not applicable to remote assets
video_duration Number

duration in milliseconds

Assets - Add Rendition

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Add a remote rendition to the given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/renditions

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
audio_only optional Boolean

whether this is only an audio track
encoding_rate optional Number

average encoding_rate in kbps
frame_height optional Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width optional Number

frame width in pixels
name optional String

asset name
progressive_download optional Boolean

whether this is a progressive download video - required for MP4 renditions
reference_id optional String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
size optional Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
video_duration optional Number

duration in milliseconds
video_codec String

the video codec — support for video formats - varies across browsers and devices; for the broadest support use h264 — remote assets will not work properly without this field
video_container optional String

the video container such as MP4 or M2TS
  • Add Rendition Request Body Example: 
{
    "video_duration": 31487,
    "name": "RA - Great Blue Heron",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/videos/mp4/greatblueheron.mp4",
    "encoding_rate": 983000,
    "frame_height": 360,
    "size": 3887659,
    "frame_width": 640
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

the Video Cloud account id
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to thumbnails
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
drm Object

DRM packaging details (not applicable to remote assets)
encoding_rate Number

average encoding rate in kbps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

duration in milliseconds
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "drm": null,
    "encoding_rate": 983000,
    "frame_height": 360,
    "frame_width": 640,
    "hds": null,
    "hls": null,
    "id": "4665726463001",
    "name": "RA - Great Blue Heron",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/videos/mp4/greatblueheron.mp4",
    "size": 3887659,
    "type": "FULL_LENGTH",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T18:02:33.808Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T18:02:33.807Z",
    "video_codec": "NONE",
    "video_container": "UNKNOWN",
    "video_duration": 31487
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use
MIXED_REMOTE_NOT_ALLOWED json

403: Remote renditions may not be added to ingested videos

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 403 MIXED_REMOTE_NOT_ALLOWED
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
[
    {
        "error_code": "MIXED_REMOTE_NOT_ALLOWED",
        "message": "It is forbidden to have only a subset of video renditions as remote assets."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Update Rendition

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Update the location for a remote rendition. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/renditions/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
audio_only optional Boolean

whether this is only an audio track
encoding_rate optional Number

average encoding_rate in kbps
frame_height optional Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width optional Number

frame width in pixels
name optional String

asset name
reference_id optional String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
size optional Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
video_duration optional Number

duration in milliseconds
video_codec optional String

the video codec — support for video formats varies across browsers and devices; for the broadest support use h264
video_container optional String

the video container such as MP4 or M2TS
  • Add Rendition Request Body Example: 
{
    "video_duration": 31487,
    "name": "RA - Great Blue Heron",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/videos/mp4/greatblueheron.mp4",
    "encoding_rate": 983000,
    "frame_height": 360,
    "size": 3887659,
    "frame_width": 640
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

the Video Cloud account id
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to thumbnails
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
drm Object

DRM packaging details (not applicable to remote assets)
encoding_rate Number

average encoding rate in kbps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_codec String

not applicable to remote assets
video_container String

not applicable to remote assets
video_duration Number

duration in milliseconds
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "drm": null,
    "encoding_rate": 983000,
    "frame_height": 360,
    "frame_width": 640,
    "hds": null,
    "hls": null,
    "id": "4665726463001",
    "name": "RA - Great Blue Heron",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/videos/mp4/greatblueheron.mp4",
    "size": 3887659,
    "type": "FULL_LENGTH",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T18:02:33.808Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T18:02:33.807Z",
    "video_codec": "NONE",
    "video_container": "UNKNOWN",
    "video_duration": 31487
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use
MIXED_REMOTE_NOT_ALLOWED json

403: Remote renditions may not be added to ingested videos

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 403 MIXED_REMOTE_NOT_ALLOWED
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
[
    {
        "error_code": "MIXED_REMOTE_NOT_ALLOWED",
        "message": "It is forbidden to have only a subset of video renditions as remote assets."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Delete Rendition

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes a rendition for the given video. Note: this operation is only for remote renditions for remote asset videos — do not use it for renditions created by Video Cloud for ingested videos

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/renditions/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

the asset id
  • Delete Rendition Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/rendition/77874616001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get Dynamic Renditions

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a list of dynamic renditions for a Dynamic Delivery video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/dynamic_renditions

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Rendition list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/renditions

Response Fields

Field Type Description
rendition_id String

the rendition id
media_type Boolean

media type for the rendition (audio or video)
drm Object

DRM packaging details (not applicable to remote assets)
encoding_rate Number

average encoding rate in kbps
frame_height Number

frame height in pixels
frame_width Number

frame width in pixels
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
duration Number

duration in milliseconds
audio_configuration String

The audio configuration of the audio track
variant String

The variant of the HLS profile (baseline, main, or high)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Assets - Get HLS Manifest List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the hls_manifest for a given video. Notes: 1) you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id 2) this method only returns a remote asset HTL manifest, not manifests for ingested videos

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hls_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • HLS Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/hls_manifest

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to hls_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.m3u8",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "HLS_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get HLS Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets an hls_manifest for a given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hls_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • HLS Manifest Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/hls_manifest/77874616001

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to hls_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.m3u8",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "HLS_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
