Assets - Add HLS Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds the location of an hls_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hls_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add HLS Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.m3u8"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to hls_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.m3u8",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "HLS_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Update HLS Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates the location of a remote hls_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hls_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add HLS Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.m3u8"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to hls_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.m3u8",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "HLS_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Delete HLS Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes an hls_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hls_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Delete HLS Manifest Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/hls_manifest/77874616001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get HDS Manifest List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the hds_manifest file for a given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hds_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • HDS Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/hds_manifest

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to hds_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hds/chickadee/chickadee.f4v",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "HDS_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Field Type Description

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.

Assets - Add HDS Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds the location of an hds_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/hds_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add HDS Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.f4v"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to hds_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hds/chickadee/chickadee.f4v",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "HDS_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes an hds_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Path Parameters

Field Type Description

video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Delete HDS Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/hds_manifest/77874616001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get ISM Manifest List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the ism_manifest for a given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ism_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • ISM Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/ism_manifest

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to ism_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.ism",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "ISM_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get ISM Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets an ism_manifest for a given video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ism_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • ISM Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/ism_manifest/77874616001

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to ism_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.ism",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "ISM_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Field Type Description

Assets - Add ISM Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds the location of an ism_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ism_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add ISM Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.ism"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to ism_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.ism",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "ISM_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Update ISM Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates the location of a remote ism_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ism_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add ISM Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.ism"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to ism_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.ism",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "ISM_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]

{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Add ISMC Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds the location of an ismc_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ismc_manifest

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add ISMC Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.ismc"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to ismc_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.ismc",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "ISMC_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Update ISMC Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates the location of a remote ismc_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ismc_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add ISMC Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.ismc"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to ismc_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.ismc",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "ISMC_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

  • 1.0.0

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/ismc_manifest/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Delete ISMC Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/ismc_manifest/77874616001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

        "message": "Permission denied."

[

        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get DASH Manifest List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the dash_manifests for a given video. Notes: 1. you can have multiple dash manifests with profiles; you can have only one dash manifest without a profile, but one manifest without a profile can be combined with muliple manifests with profiles; 2. all manifests intended to be used with the CMS API should include a profile - only DASH manifests with profiles will be returned by the CMS API — only a single DASH manifest without a profile will be returned by the Media API 3. you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/dash_manifests

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • DASH Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/dash_manifests

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to dash_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.mpd",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "MPD_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/dash_manifests/:asset_id

Field Type Description

Path Parameters

Field Type Description

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • DASH Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/dash_manifests/77874616001

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to dash_manifests
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)

when the video was last modified

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.mpd",

    "type": "MPD_MANIFEST",

Assets - Add DASH Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds a location for a remote DASH manifest Notes: 1. you can have multiple dash manifests with profiles; you can have only one dash manifest without a profile, but one manifest without a profile can be combined with muliple manifests with profiles; 2. all manifests intended to be used with the CMS API should include a profile - only DASH manifests with profiles will be returned by the CMS API — only a single DASH manifest without a profile will be returned by the Media API 3. you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/dash_manifests

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
video_duration optional Number

the duration of the video in seconds
  • Add DASH Manifest Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/hls/chickadee/chickadee.mpd"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to dash_manifests

remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

    "audio_only": false,

    "current_filename": "",

current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
video_duration Number

video duration in seconds (present if you included it when you created the asset)
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727974001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/avideo/ism/chickadee/chickadee.mpd",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "MPD_MANIFEST",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.167Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T17:02:08.165Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Delete DASH Manifest

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes an dash_manifest file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/dash_manifests/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Delete DASH Manifest list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/dash_manifests/77874616001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get Poster List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the poster file for a given video. Note that you can only add one poster for a video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/poster

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Poster list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/poster

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to posters
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-poster.png",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "VIDEO_STILL",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.439Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.436Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get Poster

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a poster file for a given video. Note that you can only add one poster for a video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/poster/:asset_id

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description

video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

the asset id

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id

not applicable to posters

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud

    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,

Assets - Add Poster

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds a poster file for a remote asset. Ingested assets must be added via the Dynamic Ingest API. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/poster

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
  • Add Posters Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-poster.png"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to posters
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-poster.png",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "VIDEO_STILL",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.439Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.436Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD

    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }

Assets - Update Poster

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates the location of a remote poster file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/poster/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
  • Add Posters Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-poster.png"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to posters
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
