Assets - Get Thumbnail List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the thumbnail for a given video. Note that you can only add one thumbnail for a video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/thumbnail

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Thumbnail list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/thumbnail

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to thumbnails
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-thumbnail.png",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "THUMBNAIL",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.439Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.436Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Get Thumbnail

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets a thumbnail file for a given video. Note that you can only add one thumbnail for a video. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/thumbnail/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

the asset id
  • Thumbnail Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/thumbnail/77874616001

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to thumbnails
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-thumbnail.png",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "THUMBNAIL",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.439Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.436Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Assets - Add Thumbnail

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds a thumbnail file for a remote asset. Ingested assets must be added via the Dynamic Ingest API. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/thumbnail

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
  • Add Thumbnails Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-thumbnail.png"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to thumbnails
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-thumbnail.png",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "THUMBNAIL",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.439Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.436Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Update Thumbnail

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates the location of a remote thumbnail file for a remote asset. Note: you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/thumbnail/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
  • Add Thumbnails Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-thumbnail.png"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to thumbnails
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "frame_height": null,
    "frame_width": null,
    "id": "4665727869001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/images/great-blue-heron-thumbnail.png",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "THUMBNAIL",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.439Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:42:22.436Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND

    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]

{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }

the asset id
  • Delete Thumbnail Example:

Assets - Get Caption List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets the caption file for a given video (DFXP captions for the Smart Player). Note: 1) the caption endpoint is ONLY for working with DFXP captions used in the legacy Smart Player - WebVTT captions (text_tracks) for the new Brightcove Player are managed using the Update Video operation; 2) you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/caption

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
  • Caption list Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/caption

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to captions
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727870001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/captions/Video-Cloud.DFXP.xml",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "CAPTION",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:52:47.758Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:52:47.758Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Note: 1) the caption endpoint is ONLY for working with DFXP captions used in the legacy Smart Player - WebVTT captions (text_tracks) for the new Brightcove Player are managed using the Update Video operation; 2) you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

Assets - Add Caption

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Adds a caption file for a remote asset (DFXP captions for the Smart Player). Note: 1) the caption endpoint is ONLY for working with DFXP captions used in the legacy Smart Player - WebVTT captions (text_tracks) for the new Brightcove Player are managed using the Update Video operation; 2) you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/caption

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
  • Add Captions Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/captions/Video-Cloud-Analytics-Performance-Report.DFXP.xml"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to captions
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727870001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/captions/Video-Cloud.DFXP.xml",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "CAPTION",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:52:47.758Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:52:47.758Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD
  • 422 REQUIRED_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Update Caption

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Updates the location of a remote caption file for a remote asset (DFXP captions for the Smart Player). Note: 1) the caption endpoint is ONLY for working with DFXP captions used in the legacy Smart Player - WebVTT captions (text_tracks) for the new Brightcove Player are managed using the Update Video operation; 2) you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/caption/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

id for the asset

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
reference_id optional String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)

Size range: 1-250
  • Add Captions Request Data Example: 
{
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/captions/Video-Cloud-Analytics-Performance-Report.DFXP.xml"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

the asset id
audio_only Boolean

not applicable to captions
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete for the asset (will be true for remote assets if a remote_url is supplied)
controller_type String

the controller type for ingested renditions (not applicable to remote renditions or other types of assets)
current_filename String

the filename for an ingested asset in the Video Cloud system (not applicable to remote assets)
cdn_origin_id String

an internally used id (not applicable to remote assets)
name String

asset name
progressive_download Boolean

whether ingested rendition is available by progressive download (not applicable to other asset types or remote renditions)
reference_id String

video reference id (must be unique within the account)
remote_url String

the url for a remote asset (not applicable to ingested assets)
remote_stream_name String

name for remote streams (not applicable to asset types other than rendition)
size Number

the size of the asset in bytes (integer)
type String

the type of the asset
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
uploaded_at DateString

when the asset was added to the video in Video Cloud
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "audio_only": false,
    "cdn_origin_id": "",
    "complete": true,
    "controller_type": "DEFAULT",
    "current_filename": "",
    "id": "4665727870001",
    "name": "",
    "progressive_download": false,
    "reference_id": "",
    "remote_stream_name": "",
    "remote_url": "http://learning-services-media.brightcove.com/captions/Video-Cloud.DFXP.xml",
    "size": 0,
    "type": "CAPTION",
    "updated_at": "2015-12-18T14:52:47.758Z",
    "uploaded_at": "2015-12-18T14:52:47.758Z"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
VALIDATION_ERROR json

422: "remote_url: REQUIRED_FIELD" — this endpoint can only be used to add remote assets
REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE json

409: The specified reference id is already in use

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
  • 409 CONFLICT
  • 400 Bad Request
  • 422 ILLEGAL_FIELD 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 409 CONFLICT
[
    {
        "error_code": "REFERENCE_ID_IN_USE",
        "message": "Reference id moose_2015_09_17 is already in use."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
{
    "error_code": "BAD_VALUE",
    "message": "Unable to process JSON"
}
HTTP/1.1 422 Unprocessable Entity
[
    {
        "error_code": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
        "message": "foo: ILLEGAL_FIELD"
    }
]

Assets - Delete Caption

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Deletes a caption file for a remote asset (DFXP captions for the Smart Player). Note: 1) the caption endpoint is ONLY for working with DFXP captions used in the legacy Smart Player - WebVTT captions (text_tracks) for the new Brightcove Player are managed using the Update Video operation; 2) you can use /videos/ref:reference_id instead of /videos/video_id

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/videos/:video_id/assets/caption/:asset_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
video_id String

Video Cloud video ID. You can also use ref:reference_id
asset_id String

the asset id
  • Delete Caption Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/videos/4077874616001/assets/caption/77874616001
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 204 NO CONTENT

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Folders

Folder operations allow you to create, retrieve, update, and delete folders, as well as add videos to or remove them from a folder.

Folders - Get Folders

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets list of folders for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/folders

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.

URL Parameters

Field Type Description
limit optional Number

number of folders to return

Default value: 20
offset optional Number

number of folders to skip in the response

Default value: 0
  • Get Folders Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/folders

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time folder created
updated_at DateString

date/time folder last modified
id String

system id for the folder
name String

folder name
video_count String

number of videos in the folder
  • Success Response: 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "account_id": "57838016001",
        "created_at": "2015-09-21T17:09:51.375Z",
        "id": "560039dfe4b0471bef470c47",
        "name": "birds",
        "updated_at": "2015-09-21T17:11:23.839Z",
        "video_count": 17
    },
    {
        "account_id": "57838016001",
        "created_at": "2015-09-21T17:09:57.260Z",
        "id": "560039e5e4b0e69e4b01cacd",
        "name": "fish",
        "updated_at": "2015-09-21T17:12:08.955Z",
        "video_count": 12
    },
    {
        "account_id": "57838016001",
        "created_at": "2015-09-21T17:10:09.422Z",
        "id": "560039f1e4b0e69e4b01cad3",
        "name": "water",
        "updated_at": "2015-09-21T17:12:09.037Z",
        "video_count": 26
    }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Folders - Get Videos in Folder

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Gets list of video objects in a folder

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/folders/:folder_id/videos

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
folder_id Number

the folder ID.

URL Parameters

Field Type Description
limit optional Number

number of videos to return

Default value: 20
offset optional Number

number of videos to skip in the response

Default value: 0
  • Get Videos in Folder Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/57838016001/folders/560039dfe4b0471bef470c47/videos

Response Fields

Field Type Description
id String

video id
name String

video title
complete Boolean

whether processing is complete
created_at DateString

when the video was created
custom_fields Object

map of fieldname-value pairs

Default value: {}
cue_points Object

array of cue point maps
  name String

cue point name
  type String

cue point type

Default value: AD
  time Number

time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
  metadata String

optional metadata string (128 single-byte characters maximum)

Default value: null
  force-stop Boolean

whether video is force-stopped at the cue point

Default value: false
description String

video short description
duration Number

video duration in milliseconds
digital_master_id String

asset id of the digital master
Economics String

whether video is AD_ENABLED (used by the Smart Player, not by the Brightcove Player)
geo Object

map of geo-filtering properties
  countries String

array of ISO 3166 list of 2-letter codes(https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#home) (search for "country codes")

Default value: null
  exclude_countries Boolean

if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing

Default value: false
  restricted Boolean

whether geo-restriction is enabled for this video

Default value: false
images Object

map of image maps
  poster Object

map of poster properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the poster
    sources Object[]

array of poster source maps
      src Url

URL for a poster source image
    src Url

URL for the default poster source image
  thumbnail Object

map of thumbnail properties
    asset_id String

asset id for the thumbnail
    sources Object[]

array of thumbnail source maps
      src Url

URL for a thumbnail source image
    src Url

URL for the default thumbnail source image
link Object

map of scheduling properties
  text String

text for the link
  url Url

URL for the link
long_description String

video long description
reference_id String

video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
schedule Object

map of scheduling properties
starts_at DateString

start date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
ends_at DateString

end date-time of availability in ISO-8601(http://www.ecma-international.org/ecma-262/5.1/#sec-15.9.1.15) format
state String

state determines whether the video is playable or not
sharing Object

map of the sharing properties for the video
  by_external_acct Boolean

whether the video was shared from another account
  by_id String

id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  source_id String

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
  to_external_acct Boolean

whether the video is shared to another account
  by_reference Boolean

whether the video is shared by reference
tags String[]

array of tags
text_tracks Object

array of text track maps
  src Url

URL for the .vtt file
  kind String

kind of text track
  srclang String

2-letter language code, such as "en" or "ko"
  mime_type String

mime-type for the track
  label String

label for the track
  default Boolean

whether this is the default track
updated_at DateString

when the video was last modified
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "id": "3931368155001",
        "account_id": "57838016001",
        "complete": true,
        "created_at": "2014-12-09T06:07:11.877Z",
        "cue_points": [
            {
                "id": "3981500051001",
                "name": "cue3",
                "type": "CODE",
                "time": 17.319,
                "metadata": "Mother-child interaction",
                "force_stop": false
            },
            {
                "id": "3981500052001",
                "name": "Pre-roll",
                "type": "AD",
                "time": 0,
                "metadata": null,
                "force_stop": false
            },
            {
                "id": "3981500053001",
                "name": "cue2",
                "type": "CODE",
                "time": 10.527,
                "metadata": "Owl turns face to us",
                "force_stop": false
            },
            {
                "id": "3981500055001",
                "name": "Post-roll",
                "type": "AD",
                "time": 41.237,
                "metadata": null,
                "force_stop": false
            },
            {
                "id": "3981500054001",
                "name": "cue1",
                "type": "CODE",
                "time": 4.418,
                "metadata": "owl turns away",
                "force_stop": false
            }
        ],
        "custom_fields": {
            "associated-topics": "Air, Nature",
            "subject": "Birds"
        },
        "description": "Mother and child owls...",
        "digital_master_id": "4508192940001",
        "duration": 41237,
        "economics": "AD_SUPPORTED",
        "folder_id": "560039dfe4b0471bef470c47",
        "geo": null,
        "images": {
            "thumbnail": {
                "asset_id": "4508192962001",
                "remote": false,
                "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201509/826/57838016001_4508192962001_3931368155001-th.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001",
                "sources": [
                    {
                        "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201509/826/57838016001_4508192962001_3931368155001-th.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "poster": {
                "asset_id": "4508192954001",
                "remote": false,
                "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201509/826/57838016001_4508192954001_3931368155001-vs.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001",
                "sources": [
                    {
                        "src": "http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/v1/unsecured/media/57838016001/201509/826/57838016001_4508192954001_3931368155001-vs.jpg?pubId=57838016001&videoId=3931368155001"
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "link": {
            "text": "Brightcove Developer Documentation",
            "url": "http://docs.brightcove.com"
        },
        "long_description": "A large owl with perky ears that look like horns",
        "name": "Great Horned Owl",
        "reference_id": "greathornedowl.mp4_1418105221982",
        "schedule": {
            "ends_at": "2017-01-01T05:00:00.000Z",
            "starts_at": "2015-01-13T05:00:00.000Z"
        },
        "sharing": {
            "by_external_acct": false,
            "by_id": null,
            "source_id": null,
            "to_external_acct": true,
            "by_reference": false
        },
        "state": "ACTIVE",
        "tags": [
            "bird",
            "nature",
            "foo",
            "air",
            "bar"
        ],
        "text_tracks": [

        ],
        "updated_at": "2015-09-25T07:19:15.473Z"
    }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.

  • 404 Error Response

    }

the folder ID

the video ID

Folders - Create Folder

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Create a new folder for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/folders

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
name String

name of the folder (must be unique in the account)
  • Create Folder Example: 
{
    "name": "mammals"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time folder created
updated_at DateString

date/time folder last modified
id String

system id for the folder
name String

folder name
video_count String

number of videos in the folder
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "created_at": "2015-09-22T12:52:43.406Z",
    "id": "56014f1be4b056563efe284e",
    "name": "mammals",
    "updated_at": "2015-09-22T12:52:43.406Z",
    "video_count": 0
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

Folders - Update Folder Name

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Update the folder name

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/folders/:folder_id

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID
folder_id String

the folder ID

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
name String

name of the folder (must be unique in the account)
  • Update Folder Example: 
{
    "name": "quadrupeds"
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account id
created_at DateString

date/time folder created
updated_at DateString

date/time folder last modified
id String

system id for the folder
name String

folder name
video_count String

number of videos in the folder
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "created_at": "2015-09-21T17:09:51.375Z",
    "id": "560039dfe4b0471bef470c47",
    "name": "quadrupeds",
    "updated_at": "2015-09-22T19:42:24.497Z",
    "video_count": 25
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable

Notifications

Notification operations allow you to add subscriptions to video change events, as well as get all subscriptions and get or delete a specific subscription.

Notifications - Get Subscriptions List

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Get a list of all notification subscriptions for the account

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/subscriptions

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID.
  • Get Notifications Example: 
https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/0098768765/subscriptions

Response Fields

Field Type Description
endpoint String

the notifications endpoint
events String[]

array of events subscribed to
id String

system id for the subscription
service_account String

the Video Cloud account id
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200
[
    {
        "endpoint": "http://solutions.brightcove.com/bcls/di-api/cms-callbacks.php",
        "events": [
            "video-change"
        ],
        "id": "a0847083-79f4-4315-8a2c-403465a3d9bc",
        "service_account": "57838016001"
    }
]

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token

Notifications - Create Subscription

  • compare changes to:
  • 1.0.0

Establishes up to 10 endpoints that video changes should be sent to. Any change in video metadata will trigger a video change event and a notification — changes to assets used by the video will not trigger change events.

https://cms.api.brightcove.com/v1/accounts/:account_id/subscriptions

Header

Field Type Description
Content-Type String

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization String

Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

Path Parameters

Field Type Description
account_id String

Video Cloud account ID

Request Body Fields

Field Type Description
endpoint String

a URL that can handle HTTP POST requests
events String[]

array of events subscribed to — currently only the video-change event is available
  • Get Notifications Example: 
{
    "endpoint":"http://solutions.brightcove.com/bcls/di-api/cms-callbacks.php",
    "events":["video-change"]
}

Response Fields

Field Type Description
endpoint String

the notifications endpoint
events String[]

array of events subscribed to
id String

system id for the subscription
service_account String

the Video Cloud account id
  • Success Response: 
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "endpoint": "http://solutions.brightcove.com/bcls/di-api/cms-callbacks.php",
    "events": [
        "video-change"
    ],
    "id": "a0847083-79f4-4315-8a2c-403465a3d9bc",
    "service_account": "57838016001"
}

Error 4xx

Field Type Description
UNAUTHORIZED json

401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your client credentials were correct for the access token
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND json

404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED json

405: The HTTP method specified is not allowed for this endpoint
NOT_AVAILABLE json

403: The resource you are requesting is temporarily unavailable
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS json

429: You are submitting too many simultaneous requests or too many requests per second
Unprocessable_Entity json

422: 1) You already have a subscription for the video-change event that delivers to that address; 2) the endpoint or events field is missing from the request; 3) you already have 10 subscriptions to this event

Error 5xx

Field Type Description
UNKNOWN json

500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later.
TIMEOUT json

500: Server likely too busy; try again later.
  • 401 UNAUTHORIZED
  • 404 Error Response 
HTTP/1.1 401 UNAUTHORIZED
[
    {
        "error_code": "UNAUTHORIZED",
        "message": "Permission denied."
    }
]
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
[
    {
        "error_code": "RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND"
    }
]

var BCLS_fix_nav = ( function (window, document) { var block_inpagenavigationblock = document.getElementById('block-inpagenavigationblock'), sidenav = document.getElementById('sidenav'); /** * remove an HTML element from a doc * @param {string} elementId the element's id * @return {[type]} [description] */ function removeElement(elementId) { if (elementId) { var element = document.getElementById(elementId); element.parentNode.removeChild(element); return true; } else { console.log('removeElement: no element id passed'); return false; } } block_inpagenavigationblock.innerHTML = sidenav.innerHTML; removeElement('sidenav'); })(window, document);
